Using their [[chakra]] or a [[ninja tool]] such as a [[Giant Folding Fan|war fan]] to manipulate or create an external source of wind, the user can create one to several blades of wind, which are capable of slicing through their target with ease. [[Temari]] and a group of [[Wikipedia:Tessenjutsu|tessenjutsu]] users from [[Sunagakure]] also used this technique as a means of countering a powerful, incoming torrent of wind.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 611, pages 15-17</ref>
